name: AnimaSync
description: Voice-driven 3D avatar animation engine for the browser. Client-side Rust/WASM + ONNX inference.

services.description: A2A Agent Card — skills, capabilities, and metadata for agent-to-agent discovery
Full LLM-readable documentation (API reference, architecture, examples, streaming)
Agent action flows for integrating AnimaSync into applications
Security contact and vulnerability reporting policy
XML sitemap for all public pages

npm.name: @goodganglabs/lipsync-wasm-v2
npm.description: V2 engine — 52-dim ARKit blendshapes via student distillation. Recommended for most projects.

npm.name: @goodganglabs/lipsync-wasm-v1
npm.description: V1 engine — 111-dim ARKit blendshapes via phoneme classification. Full expression control.
